attributes.action: Review the regulations for those who served in the Armed Forces between 1947 and 1975 who do not qualify for a pro-rata pension unless they served for 22 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned request that the Government reviews the regulations for those who served in the Armed Forces between 1947 and 1975 who do not qualify for a pro-rata pension unless they served for 22 years.

From 1975 all ex-Service personnel enjoy a pro rata pension based on the length of service completed.
